A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class DisplayHighScores
This method returns to the main menu when the "Back" button has been clicked, clears the scores file when "Clear" button is pressed or prints the top ten scores when the "Print" button has been clicked.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class EndGame
This method stores the username and exits the endgame screen when the "Submit" button had been clicked.

This method exits the game and closes the window when the "Quit" button has been clicked.

This method returns to the main menu when the "Back" button has been clicked.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Learn
Changes the screen to the MainMenu once Back button is pressed.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class LevelSelect
This method chooses to continue to one of the three levels based on which button the user has clicked.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class MainMenu
This method gets the action performed by the user and responds accordingly based on the action's returned String.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class PenguinBoard
This method moves the predators, repaints the screen and checks for collisions.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class PenguinFrame
This method gets the action performed by the user and responds accordingly based on the action's returned String.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class PlayGame
This method gets the action performed by the user and responds accordingly.
askQuestion(int) - Method in class FishingHole
This method poses a randomly selected question from a question file to the user based on the number that is passed in.

D

E

This method is the constructor, which sets the JPanel layout, sets the values of score as well as level and calls the labelField method.
